lines.text: Maybe he's just watching Slick over there, and copying his movements <i>really carefully!</c>
With a live model- or, dead model- right there, it shouldn't be too hard to copy not moving!
You learn by imitating the masters, you know.
Wh- did you just laugh at my joke?!
I can laugh if I want. I know the law.
Man, you can't turn my world upside-down like this!
Leo, with a sense of humor- what's next?
